name: nictiz.fhir.nl.stu3.zib2017
description:
Nictiz NL package of FHIR STU3 conformance resources for HCIM Release 2017. Includes MedMij and HL7 NL.

HCIMs: https://zibs.nl/wiki/HCIM_Release_2017(EN)

Initial version. See Implementation Guide for further details: 
https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/Landingspagina_MedMij

1.1.4.description:

Snapshotted versions of the StructureDefinitions and a more detailed view on the release notes can be found here: https://github.com/Nictiz/Nictiz-STU3-Zib2017/releases/tag/1.1.4

1.2.0.name: nictiz.fhir.nl.stu3.zib2017
1.2.0.description:
This release adds the 1.0.0 versions of the Conformance Resources required in the BgLZ information standard. It does not contain changes to previous released Conformance Resources, but only adds the following:

* 1 Profile on CarePlan named nl-core-careplan, 
* 3 Custom SearchParameters on the CarePlan resource, 
* 2 CapabilityStatements for BgLZ. 

Snapshot versions of the StructureDefinitions (profiles) can be found here: https://github.com/Nictiz/Nictiz-STU3-Zib2017/releases/tag/1.2.0

1.3.3.name: nictiz.fhir.nl.stu3.zib2017
1.3.3.description:
Nictiz NL package of FHIR STU3 conformance resources for HCIM Release 2017. Includes MedMij and HL7 NL. HCIMs: https://zibs.nl/wiki/HCIM_Release_2017(EN)

This release fixes a change, described in [MM-430](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-430), that was released with the previous November release for MedMij information standards. This release contains the following fix:

* [MM-806](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-806) | Adjusted incorrect FHIRPath constraints, moved extension to Consent.extension and moved mappings in extension from extension.value.reference to extension.value in zib-TreatmentDirective profile.

Snapshotted versions of the StructureDefinitions can be found here: https://github.com/Nictiz/Nictiz-STU3-Zib2017/releases/tag/1.3.3

1.3.4.name: nictiz.fhir.nl.stu3.zib2017
1.3.4.description:
Nictiz NL package of FHIR STU3 conformance resources for HCIM Release 2017. Includes MedMij and HL7 NL. HCIMs: https://zibs.nl/wiki/HCIM_Release_2017(EN)

This backwards-compatible release fixes the following issues for MedMij information standards:
* [MM-833](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-833) | Added known issue to SelfMeasurements FHIR IG regarding incorrect use of BloodGlucose LOINC code.
* [MM-800](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-800) | The contact info of the ValueSets included the invalid url "https://www.zibs.nl". This has been changed to the valid url "https://zibs.nl".
* [MM-780](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-780) | Added bi-directional extension to each ConceptMap and set to true if bidirectional or false if not bidirectional. Secondly added the code.specification extension to the FHIR-profiles where the extension was not added yet: zib-AllergyIntolerance, zib-Encounter, zib-Problem, nl-core-contactpoint.
* [MM-778](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-778) | Changed required binding for extensible on Patient.maritalStatus ValueSet reference in nl-core-patient FHIR-profile
* [MM-738](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-738) | Improved searchInclude element in all CapabilityStatements based on [resource]:[search param].
* [MM-659](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-659) | Added explanation for the use of ConceptMaps and mappings to the FHIR IG.
* [MM-632](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-632) | Restructured, renamed and optimized FHIR-examples.
* [MM-619](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-619) | In the LanguageProficiency extension for nl-core-patient:  added description on how to use the extension in the nl-core-patient profile in relation to HCIM LanguageProficiency, swapped type and level, changed display values to more descriptive terms, restricted cardinality of both type and level to 1..1
* [MM-563](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-563) | Removed unnecessary constraint on Humanname.extension:humannameassemblyOrder extension in nl-core-humanname FHIR profile.
* [MM-492](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-492) | Added comment to AllergyIntolerance.comment in the HCIM Allergyintolerance FHIR profile to explain the mapping for ValueSet AllergieStatusCodelijst to AllergyIntolerance.clinicalStatus and AllergyIntolerance.verificationStatus. Added dataAbsentReason extension to AllergyIntolerance.verificationStatus.
* [MM-467](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-467) | Added comment   on MedicationRequest.reasonCode in HCIM MedicationAgreement profile to   to explain mising HCIM mapping.
* [MM-296](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-296) | Added explanation for the use of ConceptMaps and mappings to the FHIR IG.

Snapshotted versions of the StructureDefinitions can be found here: https://github.com/Nictiz/Nictiz-STU3-Zib2017/releases/tag/1.3.4

1.3.5.name: nictiz.fhir.nl.stu3.zib2017
1.3.5.description:
Nictiz NL package of FHIR STU3 conformance resources for HCIM Release 2017. Includes MedMij and HL7 NL. HCIMs: https://zibs.nl/wiki/HCIM_Release_2017(EN)

This backwards-compatible release fixes the following issues for MedMij information standards:
* [MM-913](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-913) | Verschillende functionele-ontwerppagina's verwezen nog naar een oude versie van het MedMij-afsprakenstel. Deze links zijn aangepast naar de huidige versie.
* [MM-901](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-901) | The projectgroup has decided that the mapping of CanceledIndicator to .status in FHIR-profile zib-MedicationAgreement could be deleted because the information isn't necessarily anymore.
* [MM-900](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-900) | The slices on .supportingInformation that reference zib-BodyHeight & zib-BodyWeight in FHIR-profile zib-MedicationAgreement are removed. These elements will be used as separate models.
* [MM-899](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-899) | Added mapping to MP9 dataset to the timing-exact extension in FHIR profile zib-AdministrationSchedule.
* [MM-870](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-870) | The IHE MHD STU3 profiles on which the PDF/A standard is based, were deleted by IHE. Nictiz has copied the two missing profiles to this project.
* [MM-857](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-857) | Some FHIR example instances don't contain a narrative. Removed the unnecessary text.status values at these examples.
* [MM-852](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-852) | In HCIM MedicationUse profile: redefined slicing on MedicationStatement.derivedFrom into seperate slices to fix validator issues, also added mappings to the MedicationProcess information standard.
* [MM-831](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-831) | Add documentation on the BSN format in the Patient.identifier:BSN slice of the nl-core-patient profile.
* [MM-827](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-827) | We have added a small text about the published examples on Simplifier at the IG-pages from every information standards (except Medication).
* [MM-440](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-440) | Improvements have been made to the BgZ FHIR IG for the readability and findability of information. It concerns textual and style changes that have no impact on backwards compatibility of the standard.
* [MM-414](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-414) | Ten behoeve van leesbaarheid en vindbaarheid van informatie zijn er in het functioneel ontwerp van BgZ verbeteringen doorgevoerd. Het betreft tekstuele-/stijlwijzigingen die geen impact hebben op backwards-compatibility van de standaard.

Snapshotted versions of the StructureDefinitions can be found here: https://github.com/Nictiz/Nictiz-STU3-Zib2017/releases/tag/1.3.4

1.3.6.name: nictiz.fhir.nl.stu3.zib2017
1.3.6.description:
* [MM-1007](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1007) | The IG for the   Images information standard included broken links to example instances on   Simplifier. These have been removed and replaced with a general link to example instances on Simplifier.
* [MM-997](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-997) | The consent-additionalSources extension for the zib-TreatmentDirective profile had a context restriction on Consent.source[x], while it actually was applied on Consent directly. This fix removes that restriction.
* [MM-979](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-979) | The IG for eAfspraak incorrectly labeled the "$prefetch" operation as "$find", while the OperationDefinition filename and .id also incorrectly used "find" rather than "prefetch". This has been corrected.
* [MM-975](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-975) | Update CapabilityStatements of PDF/A information standard to include recovered IHE profiles.
* [MM-969](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-969) | Fixed irrelevant value of address.city & address.district in all examples.
* [MM-958](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-958) | The profile zib-InstructionsForUse profile used capitalized names for the DoseRange and DoseQuantity slices. Since type slices should start lowercased in FHIR, this has been changed to doseRange and doseQuantity.
* [MM-953](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-953) | Added documentation to conceptmap-ProbleemStatusCodelijst-To-Condition-Clinical-Status-Codes explaining what the relationship is between codes with equivalence type "specializes".
* [MM-947](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-947) | Extension code-specification is in use under Address.country, but this context was not yet declared as valid in this extension. This has been fixed.
* [MM-945](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-945) | Added IHE.FormatCode.vs ValueSet to the package, which is referenced in the IHE MHD STU3 profile (which was already included).
* [MM-943](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-943) | Updated coding.display names in extension-comment extension and in example instance (zib-Stoma-01) to match the display name in LOINC.
* [MM-942](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-942) | References to XML Schematron have been removed from example instances. These do not serve any implementation purpose and are not permitted by the Java validator.
* [MM-940](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-940) | In an embedded example in profile zib-MedicationUse, an incorrect oid based SNOMED reference was used. This has been corrected.
* [MM-938](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-938) | For a number of profiles, the StructureDefinition.id in now matches the final part of StructureDefinition.url. This improves predictability of handling the profile set in various reference frameworks.
* [MM-931](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-931) | Updated example zib-NursingIntervention-01 to conform to its stated profile.
* [MM-930](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-930) | .description and .id were absent in all ConceptMap recources. These two values have been added, with .id containing the final part of the canonical url.
* [MM-926](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-926) | In profiles zib-MedicalDeviceRequest and zib-AllergyIntolerance, add type slices on note.author[x] in order to conform to FHIR rules for extending polymorphic elements.
* [MM-894](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-894) | In zib-FamilySituation, zib-FamilySituationChild and zib-BodyHeight profiles, remove additional reference types from subject element.
* [MM-751](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-751) | Upped fhirVersion in FHIR profiles from "3.0.1" to "3.0.2." Changed Simplifier package dependency from "Simplifier.Core.STU3 3.0.3" to "hl7.fhir.r3.core 3.0.2".
* [MM-657](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-657) | Removed datatype Reference(EpisodeOfCare) and Reference(Encounter) in the .context element of the profiles zib-AlcoholUse, zib-DrugUse and zib-TobaccoUse.

1.3.7.name: nictiz.fhir.nl.stu3.zib2017
1.3.7.description:
Nictiz NL package of FHIR STU3 conformance resources for HCIM Release 2017. Includes MedMij and HL7 NL. HCIMs: https://zibs.nl/wiki/HCIM_Release_2017(EN)

This backwards-compatible release fixes the following issues for MedMij information standards:
* [MM-1059](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1059) | Fixed a typo in the BgLZ FHIR IG: changed 'Patient.general-pracitioner' to 'Patient.generalPractitioner'
* [MM-1053](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1053) | Changed mapping name in nl-core-organization profile from 'HCIM Patient-v3.1.1(2017EN)' to the correct 'HealthcareProvider-v3.1.1(2017EN)' as it was incorrect and could lead to misunderstanding.
* [MM-1032](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1032) | Removed the explicit slice "masterIdentifier" from the images-Media profile, as it was impossible to define a discriminator. The masterIdentifier concept is now defined directly on Media.identifier.
* [MM-1025](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1025) | Corrected the slicing logic at the discriminator path in the zib-Procedure profile.
* [MM-1017](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1017) | The SelfMeasurements IG incorrectly didn't mention the PulseRate profile. This has been added.
* [MM-1015](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1015) | Added a generated narrative to all example instances.
* [MM-1003](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1003) | In extensions zib-Payer-BankInformation and zib-TreatmentDirective-Verification, add the (required) .url element, and remove this url from the calling profile zib-Payer.
* [MM-1002](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1002) | In extension patient-nationality of the nl-core-patient profile, the binding on NationaleCodelijst has been moved from the root to the code slice.
* [MM-954](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-954) | Removed several stand-alone examples for the Images standard which were already present in an example Bundle, as they only have meaning within a Bundle context. Removed an illegal extension from one of the Images examples.
* [MM-949](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-949) | The ExtraOxygenAdministration concept in the zib-OxygenSaturation profile was illegally bound on a CodeSystem. This binding has been changed to the corresponding ValueSet.
* [MM-939](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-939) | The report element in the zib-Procedure profile used a non-existing canonical as a reference to the zib-TextResult profile. This has been fixed.
* [MM-929](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-929) | Added the code-specification extension to all examples where a ConceptMap is involved to clarify its use.
* [MM-770](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-770) | Updated example materials of nl-core-contactpoint profile to include relevant extensions as required by the zib and fixed mistakes in mapping. 
* [MM-672](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-672) | Er werden verouderde en verschillende schrijfwijzen gehanteerd van de term zib en zibs (afkorting van zorginformatiebouwstenen), dit is gecorrigeerd in de MedMij standaarden
* [MM-513](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-513) | In the nl-core-organization examples, added Organization.partOf for the aid of interpreting what an organization with multiple locations looks like.
1.3.7.unlisted: This version is deprecated. Please use a different version.

1.3.8.name: nictiz.fhir.nl.stu3.zib2017
1.3.8.description:
*NOTE*: This package replaces package version 1.3.7, which was not succesfully created.

Nictiz NL package of FHIR STU3 conformance resources for HCIM Release 2017. Includes MedMij and HL7 NL. HCIMs: https://zibs.nl/wiki/HCIM_Release_2017(EN)

This backwards-compatible release fixes the following issues for MedMij information standards:
* [MM-1059](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1059) | Fixed a typo in the BgLZ FHIR IG: changed 'Patient.general-pracitioner' to 'Patient.generalPractitioner'
* [MM-1053](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1053) | Changed mapping name in nl-core-organization profile from 'HCIM Patient-v3.1.1(2017EN)' to the correct 'HealthcareProvider-v3.1.1(2017EN)' as it was incorrect and could lead to misunderstanding.
* [MM-1032](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1032) | Removed the explicit slice "masterIdentifier" from the images-Media profile, as it was impossible to define a discriminator. The masterIdentifier concept is now defined directly on Media.identifier.
* [MM-1025](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1025) | Corrected the slicing logic at the discriminator path in the zib-Procedure profile.
* [MM-1017](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1017) | The SelfMeasurements IG incorrectly didn't mention the PulseRate profile. This has been added.
* [MM-1015](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1015) | Added a generated narrative to all example instances.
* [MM-1003](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1003) | In extensions zib-Payer-BankInformation and zib-TreatmentDirective-Verification, add the (required) .url element, and remove this url from the calling profile zib-Payer.
* [MM-1002](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1002) | In extension patient-nationality of the nl-core-patient profile, the binding on NationaleCodelijst has been moved from the root to the code slice.
* [MM-954](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-954) | Removed several stand-alone examples for the Images standard which were already present in an example Bundle, as they only have meaning within a Bundle context. Removed an illegal extension from one of the Images examples.
* [MM-949](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-949) | The ExtraOxygenAdministration concept in the zib-OxygenSaturation profile was illegally bound on a CodeSystem. This binding has been changed to the corresponding ValueSet.
* [MM-939](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-939) | The report element in the zib-Procedure profile used a non-existing canonical as a reference to the zib-TextResult profile. This has been fixed.
* [MM-929](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-929) | Added the code-specification extension to all examples where a ConceptMap is involved to clarify its use.
* [MM-770](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-770) | Updated example materials of nl-core-contactpoint profile to include relevant extensions as required by the zib and fixed mistakes in mapping. 
* [MM-672](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-672) | Er werden verouderde en verschillende schrijfwijzen gehanteerd van de term zib en zibs (afkorting van zorginformatiebouwstenen), dit is gecorrigeerd in de MedMij standaarden
* [MM-513](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-513) | In the nl-core-organization examples, added Organization.partOf for the aid of interpreting what an organization with multiple locations looks like.
1.3.8.unlisted: This version is deprecated. Please use a different version.

1.3.9.name: nictiz.fhir.nl.stu3.zib2017
1.3.9.description:
*NOTE*: This version replaces the earlier versions 1.3.7 and 1.3.8, which both are retracted due to a malfunction during package creation.

Nictiz NL package of FHIR STU3 conformance resources for HCIM Release 2017. Includes MedMij and HL7 NL. HCIMs: https://zibs.nl/wiki/HCIM_Release_2017(EN)

This backwards-compatible release fixes the following issues for MedMij information standards:
* [MM-1059](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1059) | Fixed a typo in the BgLZ FHIR IG: changed 'Patient.general-pracitioner' to 'Patient.generalPractitioner'

* [MM-1002](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1002) | In extension patient-nationality of the nl-core-patient profile, the binding on NationaleCodelijst has been moved from the root to the code slice.
* [MM-954](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-954) | Removed several stand-alone examples for the Images standard which were already present in an example Bundle, as they only have meaning within a Bundle context. Removed an illegal extension from one of the Images examples.
* [MM-949](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-949) | The ExtraOxygenAdministration concept in the zib-OxygenSaturation profile was illegally bound on a CodeSystem. This binding has been changed to the corresponding ValueSet.

1.3.10.name: nictiz.fhir.nl.stu3.zib2017
1.3.10.description:
Nictiz NL package of FHIR STU3 conformance resources for HCIM Release 2017. Includes MedMij and HL7 NL. HCIMs: https://zibs.nl/wiki/HCIM_Release_2017(EN)

This backwards-compatible release fixes the following issues for MedMij information standards:

* [MM-1175](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1175) | Added a comment in the nl-core-address profile at Address.use.extension:AD_use to signal a known issue.
* [MM-1168](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1168) | In the profiles on DocumentManifest, removed the profile references to three deleted profiles in the pReference slice.
* [MM-1167](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1167) | Add a binding strength of "extensible" to maritalStatus in nl-core-patient.
* [MM-1155](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1155) | In nl-core-address, changed the slicing logic to enable support for both GBA and ISO land codes.
* [MM-1117](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1117) | In the gp-JournalEntry profile, adjusted the discriminator for Observation.component (type to pattern, path to code and fixedCodeableConcepts to patternCodeableConcepts). Changed fixedCodeableConcepts to fixed values on coding.system in component.valueCodeableConcept.
* [MM-1115](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1115) | The HCIM MedicationAdministration was incorrectly mentioned on the IG of Medication process, therefore, the FHIR profile and resource endpoint for MedicationAdmistration are removed.
* [MM-1097](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1097) | Not all requirements for the custom search parameter 'periodofuse' were technically described for servers. Technical implementation notes were added to the IG for for Medication and to the SearchParameter. 
* [MM-1094](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1094) | Removed the retired 'zib-Appointment' profile in favor of 'eAfspraak-Appointment' in the BgZ CapabilityStatements. Added documentation about the use of the eAfspraak Appointment profile in combination with HCIM PlannedCareActivityForTransfer to the BgZ FHIR IG. Polished some HCIM terminology in the BgZ FHIR IG.
* [MM-1083](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1083) | Added mapping for zib FamilySituation concept MaritialStatus to the profile for nl-core-patient
* [MM-1081](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1081) | Added meta.profile declaration to some examples where it was missing.

2.0.0.name: nictiz.fhir.nl.stu3.zib2017
2.0.0.description:
Nictiz NL package of FHIR STU3 conformance resources for HCIM Release 2017. Includes MedMij and HL7 NL. HCIMs: https://zibs.nl/wiki/HCIM_Release_2017(EN)

This release contains the (backwards incompatible) changes for the Summer release 2020.01, which follows the earlier 2019.01 releases. It applies to the Nictiz FHIR STU3 conformance resources and MedMij information standards.

The following changes are included:

* [MM-1345](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1345) | Notebox opgenomen in het functioneel ontwerp van Vragenlijsten, welke toelicht dat de uitwisseling voor de use case 'Raadplegen vragenlijst' op dit moment niet via het MedMij Afsprakenstelsel kan plaatsvinden.
* [MM-1284](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1284) | Correctie op volgorde van benoemde processtappen use case raadplegen binnen de informatiestandaard Zelfmetingen, proces stond verkeerd om beschreven.
* [MM-1220](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1220) | De leesbaarheid van de kwalificatiepagina is vergroot. Hierbij zijn de procedurele eisen opgeschreven en is de FAQ toegevoegd.
* [MM-1204](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1204) | In the zib-BloodPressure profile, the slices for diastolic and systolic pressure have been made required.
* [MM-1177](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1177) | The information standard specific artifacts for MedicationProcss, eAfspraak, Images and BgZ have been split out from the main project/package and put into separate projects/packages. *
* [MM-1165](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1165) | To aid in a simpler HCIM mapping, the code-specification extensions on the .system and .use element in the nl-core-contactpoint profile where removed and replaced by one new extension: TelecomType. The usage of this extension and the corresponding mapping are added to the profile definition. Also changed the obsolete HCIM term 'TelecomSoort' in the profile and ConceptMaps to the now used 'TelecomType'.
* [MM-1121](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1121) | Change the profile requirement for the PDF retrieve use case from the IHE profiles to the profiles adapted by Nictiz to fix slicing issues.
* [MM-1119](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1119) | De herleidbaarheid van gegevens (data-elementen) wordt expliciet benoemd en een expliciet onderdeel van kwalificatie.
* [MM-1118](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1118) | All information standards contained sections about error handling without added value to the FHIR specification. This has been replaced with a reference to the Overarching Principles on the main FHIR IG page. The given information here has been deduplicated from the FHIR specification. Examples are given to provide added value by putting error handling in perspective to the use in the information standards. 
* [MM-1092](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1092) | An extra scenario is added for SelfMeasurements MedMij qualification. This scenario adds PHR and XIS testscripts with a search on Observation resources with category 'vital signs'.
* [MM-1090](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1090) | The AD_use extension was incorrectly used on the .use element instead of the root of the profile. The extension was replaced by a custom extension named AddressType, for a simpler and more complete mapping mechanism for HCIM AddressInformation.
* [MM-1080](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1080) | Het kwalificatiemateriaal voor Zelfmetingen wordt per use case gepubliceerd. Een (kandidaat-)deelnemer is niet verplicht te kwalificeren op meerdere use cases. Met het opknippen van het kwalificatiescript wordt dit verduidelijkt.
* [MM-1079](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1079) | Het kwalificatiemateriaal voor PDF/A wordt per use case gepubliceerd. Een (kandidaat-)deelnemer is niet verplicht te kwalificeren op meerdere use cases. Met het opknippen van het kwalificatiescript wordt dit verduidelijkt. 
* [MM-1069](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1069) | The IHE MHD list of search parameters was deemed to pose a disproportionate implementation burden for servers. A selection of the most appropriate and likely used search parameters has been made. 
* [MM-1050](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1050) | The FHIR specification on Resource.text is not completely clear and found multi interpretable. Therefore, additional explanation and guidance on this subject is added to the MedMij FHIR IG.
* [MM-1036](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1036) | The code-specification extension was not used on all the required elements where it is required in the qualification material, this has been corrected.
* [MM-1034](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1034) | It was not possible to distinguish a version-specific identifier among identifiers in the instance of a Media resource. This is solved by adding a mandatory fixed value at identifier.use in the identifier. *
* [MM-1006](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1006) | Sub-measurements in the zib-GeneralMeasurement have been changed from Observation.component's to a set of related zib-GeneralMeasurement instances. Additionally, the ResultStatusCodelist is added to Observation.status.
* [MM-972](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-972) | The definition for the use of the lastn operation is unclear in the FHIR specification, therefore interpretation is added to the FHIR IG's of the information standards that use lastn.
* [MM-941](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-941) | In the profile zib-LaboratoryTestResult-DiagnosticReport, corrected the reference to the Specimen Isolate profile, which makes it implementable.
* [MM-898](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-898) | In zib-LaboratoryTestResult-Observation, Observation.interpretation.coding is sliced to support both the FHIR core ValueSet and the (partially overlapping) HCIM ValueSet.
* [MM-854](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-854) | Add the requirement to the overarching IG that FHIR resources should adhere to the profiles listed in the IG's of the information standard.
* [MM-816](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-816) | Removed additional constraints on .author reference to allow for a Patient reference. 
* [MM-767](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-767) | In zib-LaboratoryTestResult-Speciment(-Isolate), an extension to Speciment.collectionPeriod has been added to support the TimeInterval datatype from the pre-adopted HCIM.
* [MM-733](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-733) | Scenario's voor AllergieIntolerantie in ART-DECOR ontwikkeld, zodat deze in lijn zijn met de zib. Dit geeft meer duiding.
* [MM-722](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-722) | De leesbaarheid van het Functioneel Ontwerp van AllergieIntolerantie verbeterd op basis van de zib. Tevens verwijzingen naar de dataset en de scenario's opgenomen.
* [MM-717](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-717) | De kwalificatiescripts uitgebreid met meer data, datum T geïmplementeerd en dit ontsloten via ADA. Dit komt de kwaliteit en de leesbaarheid van het kwalificatiemateriaal ten goede.
* [MM-616](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-616) | The mapping of the element RegistrationDate from HCIM AllergyIntolerance has been changed from AllergyIntolerance.reaction.onset to AllergyIntolerance.onsetDateTime. The mapping on StartDateTime has been changed from AllergyIntolerance.onset[x] to AllergyIntolerance.onsetDateTime.
* [MM-614](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-614) | The cardinality of element AllergyIntolerance.code is now 1..1 in the zib-AllergyIntolerance profile, so it aligns with HCIM AllergyIntolerance.
* [MM-529](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-529) | In the IG for GP Data, added a missing pipe symbol to the search URL for lab results so that the search is to be interpreted as the code system rather than the code.
* [MM-511](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-511) | In profile zib-LaboratoryTestResult-DiagnosticReport, make the "resultType" slice in DiagnosticReport.category.coding optional in accordance to the zib.
* [MM-507](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-507) | In "VitalSigns Profile NL", the cardinality of Observation.performer is relaxed from 1..* to 0..*
* [MM-476](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-476) | The unit of the LOINC code used for fasting blood glucose differed from the unit used in the other blood glucose LOINC codes. To rectify this, code 41604-0 was changed to 14770-2 in the valueset 'GlucoseMeetmomentenLOINCCodelijst' and on the SelfMeasurements FHIR IG. This has also been changed in the qualification material.
* [MM-451](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-451) | In het Addenda en in FHIR/ART-DECOR wordt de incomplete code: SoortInterventieCodelijst SNOMED CT 2921100014610 (gedwongen medicatie) vervangen door de juiste: SNOMED CT 29211000146105 
* [MM-437](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-437) | Updated search parameter related information on wiki pages for each standard and added chapter on search parameters to overarching principles.
* [MM-433](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-433) | Many slicing definitions were incorrect or not working properly, especially slice definitions that are differentiated by bound ValueSets. These slice definitions are now fixed and improved, allowing validators to correctly validate instances.
* [MM-421](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-421) | To aid in better interoperability between systems, several improvements have been made to the GP Data information standard, in functional design, FHIR IG, FHIR profiles and qualification material. Enumerated this means: Added Encounter (Contactmoment) and added explanation for parted contacts (Deelcontacten), Removed query on Flag, because it was already included in EpisodeOfCare, Queries on general practitioner and patient have been made optional, because they are referenced and/or included in every other resource, Added use-case relevant examples, Changed LOINC code 67781-5 to 34900-1 (already used in the Ketenzorg information standard), Aligned CapabilityStatements and qualification material in accordance with the above changes.
* [MM-419](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-419) | The example search URL for NutritionAdvice contained a paramater for status=active, where the BgZ information standard specifies a search for all known NutritionAdvice resources. Also, status is not a concept in HCIM NutritionAdvice, which makes use of this element unnecessary. As a result, the status parameter is removed from the example search url and from the BgZ qualification material.
* [MM-404](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-404) | In the HCIM Procedure profile, expanded the Procedure.performedPeriod element to Procedure.performed[x]. With this expansion, the profile meets the requirements of the HCIM, namely to capture a moment in time instead of a start/end date.
* [MM-319](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-319) | In the HCIM Problem profile, the .onsetPeriod element was used to capture the HCIM concepts ProblemStartDate and ProblemEndDate, while no period is captured in the HCIM. Therefore, Condition.onsetPeriod is changed to Condition.onsetDateTime and the HCIM mapping for ProblemStartDate is corrected. The mapping for ProblemEndDate has been moved to Condition.abatementDateTime.
* [MM-221](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-221) | In Observation based profiles, where fixed values are used in .code slices and a value is expected to be present, changed the cardinality to 1..1.

\* MM-1177 splits up information standard specific profiles for standards BgZ, eAfspraak and Images. As a result, they are moved to separate repositories, which can be found [here](https://github.com/Nictiz/Nictiz-STU3-BgZ) (BgZ) [here](https://github.com/Nictiz/Nictiz-STU3-eAfspraak) (eAfspraak) and [here](https://github.com/Nictiz/Nictiz-STU3-Images) (Images).

2.0.1.name: nictiz.fhir.nl.stu3.zib2017
2.0.1.description:
Nictiz NL package of FHIR STU3 conformance resources for HCIM Release 2017. Includes MedMij and HL7 NL. HCIMs: https://zibs.nl/wiki/HCIM_Release_2017(EN)

This backwards-compatible release fixes the following issues for MedMij information standards:

 * [MM-1459](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1459) | Onterechte paragraafnummering 1.1 veranderd naar 1.3 in addendum scenario 1.3 van BgLZ.
 * [MM-1456](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1456) | Verwijder de onterecht geïncludeerde paragrafen 1.2 en 1.3 in addendum 1.1 van de BgLZ.
 * [MM-1406](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1406) | Tekstuele verbetering Toelichting kwalificatie (/Kwalificatie) paragraaf 4.2 om duidelijker te maken dat de leverancier de foutcode moet inbouwen
 * [MM-1393](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1393) | Tweaks in the qualification materials of the PDF/A standard on multiple aspects including scripts, addendum, fixtures and wiki guidance.
 * [MM-1383](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1383) | Verwijderen van niet te gebruiken eAfspraak-scenario's afspraak maken, wijzigen en verwijderen.
 * [MM-1379](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1379) | Remove the defunct Simplifier based rendering of operations from TO's of eAfspraak and MedicationProcess.
 * [MM-1374](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1374) | In the HCIM Procedure profile, corrected naming in the mappings from the old to the new HCIM.
 * [MM-1358](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1358) | Replaced div by span in narratives of examples.
 * [MM-1353](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1353) | Notebox opgenomen in FO voor Vragenlijsten om duidelijk te maken dat de uitwisseling op dit moment niet via het MedMij Afsprakenstelsel kan plaatsvinden.
 * [MM-1343](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1343) | The references to the IHE MHD StructureDefinitions used for mapping purposes in the Images technical design have been replaced by references that resolve.
 * [MM-1328](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1328) | Clarified specifications of which transactions are needed to be supported by DVP's for PDF/A
 * [MM-1319](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1319) | Guidance has been added to the zib-LaboratoryTestResult-Observation profile on the use to of multiple LabortoryTests within one LaboratoryTestResult.
 * [MM-1285](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1285) | In the ValueSet RedenMedicatieAfspraakCodelijst, replaced the custom ART-DECOR code with SNOMED for the .designation.use element.
 * [MM-1283](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1283) | In HCIM Procedure, added mapping to the Requester (NL-CM:14.1.10) concept.
 * [MM-1281](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1281) | Gelijktrekken van woordkeuzes in kwalificatiescripts en addenda voor PDF/A
 * [MM-1260](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1260) | In het FO van de BgLZ is de verwijzing naar de toelichting kwalificatie duidelijker gemaakt.
 * [MM-1259](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1259) | Toelichting Kwalificatie Langdurige Zorg aangepast: voor 3 specifieke zibs vermeld dat de vulling optioneel is. Toegepast op zowel 2019.01 als 2020.01
 * [MM-1256](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1256) | Various tweaks to example materials to fix minor bugs.
 * [MM-1228](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1228) | Removed inline examples in TO of PDF/A and replaced them with links to simplifier examples.
 * [MM-1207](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1207) | Added syntax highlighting to XML code on wiki pages.
 * [MM-1116](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1116) | Removed FHITR patch level version from file names and descriptions of qualification materials.
 * [MM-1011](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1011) | Replaced the term "StructureDefinitions" with the more precise term "profiles" in implementation guides.
 * [MM-517](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-517) | In zib-LaboratoryTestResult-Observation, removed the fixed value of "has-member" in related.type. Added guidance on the use of this profile in relation to other instances.
 * [MM-267](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-267) | Toevoegen notebox aan FO's om te verduidelijken dat de term "PGO" ook als ander soort eindgebruiker geïnterpreteerd kan worden.

2.0.2.name: nictiz.fhir.nl.stu3.zib2017
2.0.2.description:
Nictiz NL package of FHIR STU3 conformance resources for HCIM Release 2017. Includes MedMij and HL7 NL. HCIMs: https://zibs.nl/wiki/HCIM_Release_2017(EN)

This backwards-compatible release fixes the following issues for MedMij information standards:

* [MM-1461](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1461) | Om duidelijk kenbaar te maken dat de zib VrijheidsbeperkendeMaatregelen achterhaald is, deze zib niet meer uitgewisseld dient te worden en niet meer gecontroleerd wordt in de MedMij-kwalificatie, zijn er op de volgende pagina's issueboxen en overige opmerkingen geplaatst (in 2019.01 en 2020.01 versies): Inhoud GGZ, Functioneel Ontwerp, Technisch Ontwerp en Toelichting Kwalificatie GGZ. In ART-DECOR is het betrefffende concept op deprecated gezet & een nieuwe transactie (versie 1.1) gepubliceerd. Voor deze laatste transactie staan er nu ook links in het Functioneel Ontwerp naar de nieuwe versie.
* [MM-1457](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1457) | Created a new general FHIR IG based on the MedMij FHIR IG. The MedMij FHIR IG now includes this new, common FHIR IG.
* [MM-1455](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1455) | Changed the faulty HCIM name 'MedicalAid' to 'MedicalDevice' on the BgZ FHIR IG.
* [MM-1454](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1454) | In the FHIR IG, change the requirement for resource.id from SHALL to SHOULD for searchset Bundles, remove the requirement to use the UUID to populate the id field. Add extra guidance on this topic.
* [MM-1446](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1446) | Op de MedMij-landingspagina ontbrak de verwijzing naar de kwalificatiepagina voor publicatie 2019.01, deze is toegevoegd.
* [MM-1444](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1444) | In the explanation on planning activities represented in HCIM PlannedCareActivityForTransfer mentioned both HCIM names as well as FHIR core resources which led to confusion. Because of conformance, this has been corrected, now only FHIR core resources are mentioned.
* [MM-1441](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1441) | De toelichting over tijdnotatie en tijdzone in Touchstone ontbrak op de pagina 'Kwalificatie aansluiten'. Deze is toegevoegd.
* [MM-1420](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1420) | Added extra embedded examples to Observation.component:Amount.value[x]:valueQuantity in the HCIM AlcoholUse and HCIM TobaccoUse profiles to clarify the use of UCUM annotations in units.
* [MM-1418](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1418) | The publisher element, stating Nictiz as publisher, is added to FHIR profiles where it was missing.
* [MM-1390](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1390) | The mapping comment for BasicElements::DateTime was incorrectly named 'StartDateTime', this has been corrected to 'DateTime'.
* [MM-1386](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1386) | Replaced incorrect links to the Simplifier project in the 'Terminology, NamingSystems, Mappings' section of IGs by references to the relevant published packages.
* [MM-1248](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1248) | The reference on .extension:ConcernReference in the HCIM Alert profile is unconstrained, leading to unclarity on what resource types can be expected. A comment has been added to explain this.
* [MM-989](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-989) | Het kwalificatiescript voor 'MedMij Raadplegen Laboratoriumresultaten' bevat een foute verwijzing, namelijk naar het addendum voor raadplegen in plaats van beschikbaarstellen. Dit is gecorrigeerd.
* [MM-988](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-988) | In het functioneel ontwerp van de MedMij-standaard Laboratoriumresultaten staat in de inleiding een foutieve zib-naam 'OverdrachtLaboratoriumUitslag'. Dit is aangepast naar de juiste naam 'LaboratoriumUitslag'.
* [MM-791](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-791) | Several profiles missed the extension on .ValueSetReference with a reference to the corresponding ConceptMap, this has been corrected. In addition, the ConceptMap comments have been moved to the mapping.comment element.
2.0.2.unlisted: This version is deprecated. Please use a different version.

2.0.3.name: nictiz.fhir.nl.stu3.zib2017
2.0.3.description:
Nictiz NL package of FHIR STU3 conformance resources for HCIM Release 2017. Includes MedMij and HL7 NL. HCIMs: https://zibs.nl/wiki/HCIM_Release_2017(EN)

This backwards-compatible release fixes the following issues for MedMij information standards:

* [MM-1461](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1461) | Om duidelijk kenbaar te maken dat de zib VrijheidsbeperkendeMaatregelen achterhaald is, deze zib niet meer uitgewisseld dient te worden en niet meer gecontroleerd wordt in de MedMij-kwalificatie, zijn er op de volgende pagina's issueboxen en overige opmerkingen geplaatst (in 2019.01 en 2020.01 versies): Inhoud GGZ, Functioneel Ontwerp, Technisch Ontwerp en Toelichting Kwalificatie GGZ. In ART-DECOR is het betrefffende concept op deprecated gezet & een nieuwe transactie (versie 1.1) gepubliceerd. Voor deze laatste transactie staan er nu ook links in het Functioneel Ontwerp naar de nieuwe versie.

* [MM-1446](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1446) | Op de MedMij-landingspagina ontbrak de verwijzing naar de kwalificatiepagina voor publicatie 2019.01, deze is toegevoegd.
* [MM-1444](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1444) | In the explanation on planning activities represented in HCIM PlannedCareActivityForTransfer mentioned both HCIM names as well as FHIR core resources which led to confusion. Because of conformance, this has been corrected, now only FHIR core resources are mentioned.
* [MM-1441](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1441) | De toelichting over tijdnotatie en tijdzone in Touchstone ontbrak op de pagina 'Kwalificatie aansluiten'. Deze is toegevoegd.
* [MM-1420](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1420) | Added extra embedded examples to Observation.component:Amount.value[x]:valueQuantity in the HCIM AlcoholUse and HCIM TobaccoUse profiles to clarify the use of UCUM annotations in units.
* [MM-1418](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1418) | The publisher element, stating Nictiz as publisher, is added to FHIR profiles where it was missing.
* [MM-1390](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1390) | The mapping comment for BasicElements::DateTime was incorrectly named 'StartDateTime', this has been corrected to 'DateTime'.
* [MM-1386](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1386) | Replaced incorrect links to the Simplifier project in the 'Terminology, NamingSystems, Mappings' section of IGs by references to the relevant published packages.
* [MM-1248](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-1248) | The reference on .extension:ConcernReference in the HCIM Alert profile is unconstrained, leading to unclarity on what resource types can be expected. A comment has been added to explain this.
* [MM-989](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-989) | Het kwalificatiescript voor 'MedMij Raadplegen Laboratoriumresultaten' bevat een foute verwijzing, namelijk naar het addendum voor raadplegen in plaats van beschikbaarstellen. Dit is gecorrigeerd.
* [MM-988](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-988) | In het functioneel ontwerp van de MedMij-standaard Laboratoriumresultaten staat in de inleiding een foutieve zib-naam 'OverdrachtLaboratoriumUitslag'. Dit is aangepast naar de juiste naam 'LaboratoriumUitslag'.
* [MM-791](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/MM-791) | Several profiles missed the extension on .ValueSetReference with a reference to the corresponding ConceptMap, this has been corrected. In addition, the ConceptMap comments have been moved to the mapping.comment element.
